Verses: 1 paskaa Ennappatta Pulippillaadha Appappandigai Sameebamaayitru.
2 appozhudhu Piradhaana Aasaariyarum Vedhapaaragarum Avaraik Kolaiseyyumpadi Yosiththu, Janangalukkup Bayappattapadiyinaal, Evvidhamaai Appadich Seyyalaamendru Vagaithedinaargal.
3 appozhudhu Panniruvaril Oruvanaagiya Skaariyoththennum Maruperkonda Yoodhaasukkul Saaththaan Pugundhaan.
4 avan Piradhaana Aasaariyargalidaththilum Senaith Thalaivargalidaththilum Poi, Avaraik Kaattikkodukkum Vagaiyaik Kuriththu Avargalode Aalosanai Panninaan.
5 avargal Sandhoshappattu, Avanukkup Panangodukka Udanpattaargal.
6 adharku Avan Sammadhiththu, Janakkoottamillaadha Velaiyil Avarai Avargalukkuk Kaattikkodukkumpadi Samayanthedinaan.
7 paskaavaip Baliyidavendiya Pulippillaadha Appap Pandigai Naal Vandhadhu.
8 appozhudhu Avar Pedhuruvaiyum Yovaanaiyum Azhaiththu: Naam Paskaavaip Pusikkumpadikku Neengal Poi, Adhai Namakku Aayaththam Pannungal Endraar.
9 adharku Avargal: Naangal Adhai Enge Aayaththampannumpadi Siththamaayirukkireer Endru Kettaargal.
10 adharku Avar: Neengal Nagaraththil Piravesikkumbodhu, Thanneerkkudam Sumandhuvarugira Oru Manushan Ungalukku Edhirppaduvaan; Neengal Avanukkup Pinsendru, Avan Pogum Veettirkul Neengalum Poi,
11 andha Veettejamaanai Nokki: Naan En Seesharodukoodap Paskaavaip Pusikkiradharkuth Thagudhiyaana Idam Enge Endru Podhagar Ummidaththil Ketkach Sonnaar Endru Sollungal.
12 avan Kambalamudhalaanavaigal Viriththirukkira Melveettilulla Oruperiya Araiyai Ungalukkuk Kaanbippaan; Ange Aayaththampannungal Endru Solli Anuppinaar.
13 avargal Poi, Thangalidaththil Avar Sonnapadiye Kandu, Paskaavai Aayaththampanninaargal.
14 velaivandhapodhu, Avarum Avarudanekoodap Pannirandu Apposthalarum Pandhiyirundhaargal.
15 appozhudhu Avar Avargalai Nokki: Naan Paadupadukiradharku Munne Ungaludanekoota Indhap Paskaavaip Pusikka Migavum Aasaiyaayirundhen.
16 dhevanudaiya Raajyaththile Idhu Niraiverumalavum Naan Ini Idhaip Pusippadhillaiyendru Ungalukkuch Sollugiren Endru Solli,
17 avar Paaththiraththai Eduththu, Sthoththirampanni: Neengal Idhai Vaangi, Ungalukkulle Pangittukkollungal;
18 dhevanudaiya Raajyam Varumalavum Naan Thiraatchappazharasaththaip Baanampannuvadhillaiyendru Ungalukkuch Sollugiren Endraar.

19 pinbu Avar Appaththai Eduththu, Sthoththirampanni Adhaip Pittu, Avargalukkuk Koduththu: Idhu Ungalukkaagak Kodukkappadugira Ennudaiya Sareeramaayirukkiradhu; Ennai Ninaivukoorumbadi Idhaich Seyyungal Endraar.
20 pojanampanninapinbu Avar Andhappadiye Paaththiraththaiyum Koduththu: Indhap Paaththiram Ungalukkaakach Sindhappadugira Ennudaiya Raththaththinaalaagiya Pudhiya Udanpadikkaiyaayirukkiradhu Endraar.
21 pinbu: Idho Ennaik Kaattik Kodukkiravanudaiya Kai Ennudane Koodap Pandhiyilirukkiradhu.
22 theermaanikkappattapadiye Manushakumaaran Pogiraar, Aanaalum Avaraik Kaattikkodukkira Manushanukku Aiyo Endraar.
23 appozhudhu Avargal Nammil Yaar Appadich Seyvaan Endru Thangalukkulle Visaarikkath Thodanginaargal.
24 andriyum Thangalil Evan Periyavanaayiruppaan Endru Avargalukkulle Vaakkuvaadham Undaayitru.
25 avar Avargalai Nokki: Purajaadhiyaarin Raajaakkal Avargalai Aalugiraargal; Avargalmel Adhigaaram Seluththukiravargalum Ubagaarigal Ennappadugiraargal.
26 ungalukkulle Appadiyirukkakkoodaadhu; Ungalil Periyavan Siriyavanaippolavum, Thalaivan Panividaikkaaranaippolavum Irukkakkadavan.
27 pandhiyirukkiravano, Panividaiseygiravano, Evan Periyavan? Pandhiyirukkiravan Allavaa? Appadiyirundhum, Naan Ungal Naduvile Panividaikkaaranaippol Irukkiren.
28 melum Enakku Neritta Sodhanaigalil Ennode Kooda Nilaiththirundhavargal Neengale.
29 aagaiyaal, En Pidhaa Enakku Oru Raajyaththai Erpaduththinadhupola, Naanum Ungalukku Erpaduththugiren.
30 neengal En Raajyaththile En Pandhiyil Pojanapaanampanni, Isravelin Pannirandu Koththirangalaiyum Niyaayantheerkkiravargalaaich Singaasanangalinmel Utkaaruveergal Endraar.
31 pinnum Karththar: Seemone, Seemone, Idho, Kodhumaiyaich Sulaginaal Pudaikkiradhupolach Saaththaan Ungalaip Pudaikkiradharku Uththaravu Kettukkondaan.
32 naano Un Visuvaasam Ozhindhupogaadhapadikku Unakkaaga Vendikkonden: Nee Kunappattapinbu Un Sagodhararai Sthirappaduththu Endraar.
33 adharku Avan: Aandavare, Kaavalilum Saavilum Ummaip Pinbatrivara Aayaththamaayirukkiren Endraan.
34 avar Avanai Nokki: Pedhuruve, Indraikkuch Seval Koovukiradharku Munne Nee Ennai Arindhirukkiradhai Moondrudharam Marudhalippaai Endru Unakkuch Sollugiren Endraar.

35 pinnum Avar Avargalai Nokki: Naan Ungalaip Panappaiyum Saamaanpaiyum Paadharatchaigalum Illaamal Anuppinapodhu, Edhaagilum Ungalukku Kuraivaayirundhadhaa Endraar. Avargal, Ondrum Kuraivaayirundhadhillai Endraargal.
36 adharku Avar: Ippozhudho Panappaiyum Saamaanpaiyum Udaiyavan Avaigalai Eduththukkollakkadavan; Pattayam Illaadhavan Than Vasthiraththai Vitru Ondraik Kollakkadavan.

37 akkiramakkaararil Oruvanaaga Ennappattaar Endru Ezhudhiyirukkira Vaakkiyam Ennidaththil Niraiveravendiyadhendru Ungalukkuch Sollugiren. Ennaippatriya Kaariyangal Mudivuperungaalam Vandhirukkiradhu Endraar.
38 adharku Avargal: Aandavare, Idho Inge Irandu Pattayam Irukkiradhu Endraargal. Avar: Podhum Endraar.
39 pinbu Avar Purappattu, Vazhakkaththinpadiye Olivamalaikkup Ponaar, Avarudaiya Seesharum Avarode Koodapponaargal.
40 avvidaththil Serndhapozhudhu Avar Avargalai Nokki: Neengal Sodhanaikkutpadaadhapadikku Jebampannungal Endru Solli,
41 avargalai Vittuk Kalleridhooram Appurampoi, Muzhangaalpadiyittu:
42 pidhaave, Umakkuch Siththamaanaal Indhap Paaththiram Ennaivittu Neengumpadiseyyum; Aayinum Ennudaiya Siththaththinpadiyalla, Ummudaiya Siththaththinpadiye Aagakkadavadhu Endru Jebampanninaar.
43 appozhudhu Vaanaththilirundhu Oru Thoodhan Thondri, Avaraip Balappaduththinaan.
44 avar Migavum Viyaagulappattu, Adhiga Ookkaththode Jebampanninaar. Avarudaiya Vervai Raththaththin Perundhuligalaaith Tharaiyile Vizhundhadhu.
45 avar Jebampanni Mudiththu, Ezhundhirundhu, Thammudaiya Seesharidaththil Vandhu, Avargal Dhukkaththinaale Niththirai Pannugiradhaik Kandu:
46 neengal Niththiraipannugiradhenna? Sodhanaikkutpadaadhapadikku, Ezhundhirundhu Jebampannungal Endraar.
47 avar Appadip Pesugaiyil Janangal Koottamaai Vandhaargal. Avargalukku Munne Panniruvaril Oruvanaagiya Yoodhaas Enbavanum Vandhu, Yesuvai Muththanjeyyumpadi Avaridaththil Serndhaan.
48 yesu Avanai Nokki: Yoodhaase, Muththaththinaaleyaa Manushakumaaranaik Kaattikkodukkiraai Endraar.
49 avaraich Soozhanindravargal Nadakkappogiradhaik Kandu: Aandavare, Pattayaththinaale Vettuvomaa Endraargal.
50 andhappadiye Avargalil Oruvan Piradhaana Aasaariyanudaiya Velaikkaaranai Valadhukaadhara Vettinaan.
51 appozhudhu Yesu Immattil Niruththungal Endru Solli Avanudaiya Kaadhaiththottu, Avanaich Sosdhappaduththinaar.

52 pinbu Yesu Thamakku Virodhamaai Vandha Piradhaana Aasaariyargalaiyum Dhevaalayaththuch Senaiththalaivargalaiyum Mooppargalaiyum Nokki: Oru Kallanaip Pidikkap Purappattu Varugiradhupola, Neengal Pattayangalaiyum Thadigalaiyum Eduththup Purappattuvandheergale.
53 naan Thinandhorum Dhevaalayaththil Ungaludanekooda Irukkaiyil Neengal Ennaip Pidikkak Kai Neettavillai; Idhuvo Ungaludaiya Velaiyum Andhagaaraththin Adhigaaramumaayirukkiradhu Endraar.
54 avargal Avaraip Pidiththapinbu, Piradhaana Aasaariyanudaiya Veettil Kondupoi Vittaargal. Pedhuruvum Thooraththile Pinsendraan.
55 avargal Mutraththin Naduvile Neruppai Mootti, Adhaich Sutri Utkaarndhapodhu, Pedhuruvum Avargal Naduvile Utkaarndhaan.
56 appozhudhu, Oru Velaikkaari Avanai Neruppandaiyile Utkaarndhirukkakkandu, Avanai Utruppaarththu: Ivanum Avanodirundhaan Endraal.
57 adharku Avan: Sthireeye, Avanai Ariyen Endru Marudhaliththaan.
58 satruneraththukkup Pinbu Veroruvan Avanaik Kandu: Neeyum Avargalil Oruvan Endraan. Adharkup Pedhuru: Manushane, Naan Alla Endraan.
59 erakkuraiya Orumani Neraththukkuppinbu Veroruvan Avanaip Paarththu: Meyyaagave Ivanum Avanodirundhaan, Ivan Galileyandhaan Endru Saadhiththaan.
60 adharkup Pedhuru: Manushane, Nee Sollugiradhai Ariyen Endraan. Avan Ippadich Sonnavudane Seval Koovitru.

61 appozhudhu Karththar Thirumbi, Pedhuruvai Nokkippaarththaar. Seval Koovugiradharku Munne Nee Ennai Moondrudharam Marudhalippaai Endru Karththar Thannidaththil Sonna Vasanaththai Udane Pedhuru Ninaivukoorndhu,
62 veliye Poi, Manangasandhu Azhudhaan.
63 yesuvaip Pidiththukkonda Manushar Avaraip Pariyaasampanni, Adiththu,
64 avarudaiya Kangalaik Katti, Avarudaiya Mugaththil Araindhu: Unnai Adiththavan Yaar, Adhai Gnaanadhirushtiyinaal Sol Endru Avaraikkettadhumandri,
65 matrum Anega Dhooshanavaarththaigalaiyum Avarukku Virodhamaagach Sonnaargal.
66 vidiyarkaalamaanapodhu Janaththin Moopparum Piradhaana Aasaariyarum Vedhapaaragarum Koodivandhu, Thangal Aalosanai Sangaththil Avaraik Konduvandhu Niruththi:
67 nee Kiristhuvaa? Adhai Engalukkuchsol Endraargal. Adharku Avar: Naan Ungalukkuch Sonnaalum Nambamaatteergal.
68 naan Ungalidaththil Vinaavinaalum Enakku Maaruththaram Sollamaatteergal, Ennai Vidudhalaipannavumaatteergal.
69 idhumudhal Manushakumaaran Sarvavallamaiyulla Dhevanudaiya Valadhupaarisaththil Veetriruppaar Endraar.
70 adharku Avargalellaarum: Appadiyaanaal, Nee Dhevanudaiya Kumaaranaa Endru Kettaargal; Adharku Avar: Neengal Sollugirapadiye Naan Avardhaan Endraar.
71 appozhudhu Avargal: Ini Verusaatchi Namakku Venduvadhenna? Naame Ivanudaiya Vaayinaale Kettome Endraargal.
